name: RottenAvocado
description:
This css has been made aiming for sobriety and style. The code was written by me from the perspective that it is possible to write little and get big changes to the look of pages. This is first of all, efficiency. 

My point of view is that simplicity must be maintained to always give a light and satisfying look.

user.name: C h a c o n A l e x

additional_info: There are still no changes. However, they will be made as needed and with platform updates.
